0.origdescription: Virgil Flowers investigates shootings in a Minnesota town following an attempt to revive its ailing economy.

1.origauthor: James Patterson and James O Born
1.origdescription: Michael Bennett discovers that an assassin is targeting him and his family.

2.origtitle: THE NEXT PERSON YOU MEET IN HEAVEN
2.origdescription: The sequel to "The Five People You Meet in Heaven" follows Annie on her heavenly journey.

3.origdescription: After Toby Hennessy retreats to his family’s ancestral home, a skull discovered in the backyard exposes his family's past.

4.origdescription: A century-old mystery at the Birchwood Manor on the Thames connects the lives of an archivist and artist.

5.origdescription: Irene Steele uncovers her husband’s secret life on a Caribbean island following his death.

6.origdescription: The lives of patients, doctors and activists intersect when a gunman holds them all hostage in a woman's health center in Mississippi.

7.origdescription: The discovery of an unseen work in an artist’s attic unleashes a series of bizarre occurrences that a painter must navigate.

8.origdescription: When the Russian prime minister plots to invade the Baltics, only Mitch Rapp can stop him.

9.origdescription: In a quiet town on the North Carolina coast in 1969, a young woman who survived alone in the marsh becomes a murder suspect.

10.origdescription: A New Yorker gets a surprise when she spends the summer with her boyfriend in Singapore.

11.origdescription: A concentration camp detainee tasked with permanently marking fellow prisoners falls in love with one of them.

12.origdescription: The fourth book in the Cormoran Strike series. Detectives Strike and Ellacott investigate a crime a young man may have witnessed as a child; by J. K. Rowling, writing pseudonymously.

13.origdescription: A young woman’s well-ordered life is disrupted by the I.T. guy from her office.

14.origdescription: Ruby Bozarth defends a college football star charged in a felony case complicated by a second murder.
